Author: Marulu, StreetRat
Name: XIVR - VR Mod
Description:
Mod to allow vr.
WARNING - SEIZURES If you are prone to epileptic seizures, DO NOT PLAY THIS MOD. Your desktop screen will flicker rapidly while VR is active. (The in-headset view won't flicker.)
      ** Requires SteamVR **
Source: https://github.com/ProjectMimer/xivr
Chat/FAQ: flat2vr.com
